projects.title: Adaptive Grasping Robot
projects.subtitle: Tactile + vision cues for stable manipulation
projects.summary: Built a closed-loop grasping system that blends tactile sensing with camera feedback for robust picks.

glance.oneLiner: A multi-sensor grasping loop that improves success rates on irregular objects.
glance.problem: Single-modality grasping struggles with occlusions and surface variation.
glance.approach: Fuse tactile signals with camera pose estimates and replan grips online.
glance.results: Improved stability and fewer failed lifts on cluttered scenes.

deep.overview: We combine tactile feedback with visual pose tracking to update grasps in real time.
methodsBullets: Tactile slip detection using lightweight CNNs

projects.title: Campus Navigation SLAM
projects.subtitle: Long-horizon localization for indoor/outdoor routes
projects.summary: A SLAM pipeline tailored to campus-scale navigation with map stitching and relocalization.

glance.oneLiner: Hybrid lidar-vision SLAM for routes that cross buildings and courtyards.
glance.problem: Standard indoor SLAM fails under lighting changes and open spaces.
glance.approach: Fuse lidar scans with visual landmarks and map segments.

deep.overview: We stitch local maps and relocalize via image-based place recognition.
methodsBullets: Lidar scan matching with adaptive thresholds

projects.title: Soccer Pass Forecasting
projects.subtitle: Predictive models for spatial passing choices
projects.summary: Modeled pass destination likelihoods from multi-agent spatial context.

glance.oneLiner: Heatmap-based models that predict pass targets from game state.
glance.problem: Sparse snapshots make it hard to infer likely recipients.
glance.approach: Train CNNs on multi-channel pitch tensors.
glance.results: Localized distributions aligned with open space.

projects.title: Visual Odometry Stack
projects.subtitle: Monocular + IMU odometry for lightweight robots
projects.summary: Implemented a calibrated odometry pipeline with robust drift control.

glance.oneLiner: A VO pipeline with IMU fusion for better drift control.
glance.problem: Monocular VO drifts in low-texture scenes.
glance.approach: Tight IMU integration and feature management.
glance.results: Reduced scale drift on long trajectories.

projects.title: Assistive Robot UX Study
projects.subtitle: Human-centered interactions for home robots
projects.summary: Designed and evaluated interaction flows for task guidance and safety cues.

glance.oneLiner: Interaction patterns that improved trust and task clarity.
glance.problem: Users struggled to interpret robot intent during assistance.
glance.approach: Iterate on cues, phrasing, and feedback timing.

projects.title: Self-Supervised Perception
projects.subtitle: Representation learning without labels
projects.summary: Explored contrastive pretraining to improve downstream segmentation.

glance.oneLiner: Contrastive pretraining for better segmentation with small labels.
glance.approach: Pretrain on unlabeled frames and fine-tune.
glance.results: Improved accuracy with fewer labeled samples.

projects.title: Warehouse Path Planning
projects.subtitle: Multi-robot coordination with dynamic obstacles
projects.summary: Implemented task assignment and path planning for warehouse pickers.

glance.oneLiner: Task allocation and collision-aware planning in shared aisles.
glance.problem: Naive routing increases congestion and delays.

projects.title: Drone Mapping Pipeline
projects.subtitle: Terrain mapping from aerial imagery
projects.summary: Automated a pipeline to build elevation and texture maps from drone footage.

glance.oneLiner: A reproducible workflow from video to terrain model.
glance.problem: Manual processing is slow and error-prone.
glance.results: Faster map generation with consistent outputs.

projects.title: Autonomous Delivery Cart
projects.subtitle: Sidewalk navigation with safety constraints
projects.summary: Designed a perception-to-planning stack for a small delivery cart prototype.

glance.oneLiner: Safe sidewalk navigation with obstacle-aware planning.

projects.title: Vision-Language Robot Demo
projects.subtitle: Grounding text commands in tabletop scenes
projects.summary: Connected a vision model to a language interface for object retrieval tasks.

glance.oneLiner: Text-guided retrieval in cluttered tabletop scenes.
glance.approach: Ground phrases to regions with similarity scores.
glance.results: Accurate retrieval with natural language prompts.

projects.title: Robotics Teaching Kit
projects.subtitle: Hands-on labs for intro robotics
projects.summary: Designed lab modules and starter code for a robotics course.

glance.oneLiner: Modular labs spanning sensing, control, and mapping.

projects.title: Soccer Analytics Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Interactive data storytelling for matches
projects.summary: Built a dashboard that surfaces spatial trends and match events.

glance.oneLiner: Interactive charts for match timelines and spatial trends.
